rounds.comments: (Ken: We begin in honor of Jeopardy!'s 41st season with 41.)

clues.text: The 41st state, it's known as "The Treasure State" for its immense mineral wealth

rounds.comments: (Ken: Once again, we have 41, but this time in honor of our 41st president, who would have been 100 this year.)

clues.text: George H.W. Bush famously pledged to work toward a nation nicer in these 2 ways

rounds.text: The 4-syllable name of this city is almost identical to its namesake town in Spain, except that the Spanish one has an extra "R"
